Imparfait (Imperfect).Je portais: I used to carry / I used to wear
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu portais: You used to carry / You used to wear
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle portait: He/She used to carry / He/She used to wear
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous portions: We used to carry / We used to wear
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous portiez: You used to carry / You used to wear (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles portaient: They used to carry / They used to wear

Futur simple (Simple Future).Je porterai: I will carry / I will wear
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu porteras: You will carry / You will wear
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle portera: He/She will carry / He/She will wear
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous porterons: We will carry / We will wear
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous porterez: You will carry / You will wear (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles porteront: They will carry / They will wear
